3: Um...
Phew! What a relief.
Thanks, Commandant!
Let's move on to the next one if we're done checking your M.I.N.D.
Hmph! You're always so mean, Lee.
You're lucky that it's me here. If it was someone else, you'd be in a fight ages ago!
...Now that you mention it, we've never really been in a fight, have we?
Don't give people the wrong ideas! We've had talky fights! Just not punchy fights!
Enough with it. Get here already!
Yeah, yeah, I'm coming...

2: Kamui really fits it, doesn't he?

3: There's so much energy here when Kamui's with us.

2: If we just talk to Chrome...

3: I don't think Capt will say yes—
Sure, we have a great relationship here.
But I'm a Strike Hawk. Always have been. Not to mention that this kind of transfer should go through the top brass, right?
Are you suggesting the commandant talk to the headquarters?
What? No! That's not what I meant!
Aaaargh! Hold on! Gently! The gears are stuck!
I'm always gentle.
Commandant!
Even Chrome won't save you now.
You're always on his side, Commandant.
It hurts! IT HURTS!
(Ugly cries) Commandant! How can you stand this?!
